data.title: Everton Squad, 1994
data.text:
GOALKEEPERS

No

Name Comments 1 Neville Southall The Legend between the sticks just keeps on going 13 Jason Kearton Young Australian goalie always in Nev's shadow 33 James Speare Reserve keeper never even got a look-in DEFENDERS

No

Name Comments 2 Earl Barrett The erratic defender who was a favourite with Joe Royle 3 Andy Hinchcliffe The England international with the lethal left foot 4 David Unsworth Competent defender getting slow and clumsy 5 Dave Watson Commanding centre-back, team captain and loyal club servant.

19

Marc Hottiger Poor Swiss defender who never produced the goods 21 Craig Short Tall centre-back with a head for important goals. 24 Jon O'Connor Young skillful right-back didn't get a game all season 25 Neil Moore Central defender who never quite made the grade 26 Graham Allen Another youngster competing for a place in the back line. 27 Mark Grugel Young Reserve never made it into the senior side 28 Chris Price Young Reserve never made it into the senior side MIDFIELDERS

No

Name Comments 14 John Ebbrell Played an importance midfield role 15 Matthew Jackson The beginning of the end as Royle doesn't rate poor Matt 16 Vinny Samways Inconsistent midfielder never really performed for Everton 18 Joe Parkinson Solid midfield ball-winner suffered a critical mid-season injury 20 Tony Grant Promising season ruined by injuries 22 Peter Holcroft Reserves midfielder never played for the first team 29 Andy Weathers Young Reserve never made it into the senior side 30 Ged Hennigan Young Reserve never made it into the senior side 32 Matthew Woods Young Reserve never made it into the senior side FORWARDS

No

Name Comments 7 Graham Stuart The adopted cockney scored a bagful: 14 goals 8 Paul Rideout FA Cup Final hero turns in the goals 9 Duncan Ferguson The towering Scot spent 6 weeks in Barlinnie Prison 11 Anders Limpar Mercurial wizard is key to Everton's success this season 12 Daniel Amokachi The brilliantly inconsistent fans hero 17 Andrei Kanchelskis Brilliant striker had his best ever season for any team 23 Michael Branch Nippy forward still running-in his shooting boots. TRANSFERRED

Link to Everton Transfers

No Name Destination and Date 6 Gary Ablett Ex-Liverpool defender finally moved on to Birmingham (Jun 96) 34 Paul Holmes Released (May 96)
